title: Participatory e-Learning-Based Soil-Less Cultivation System Course for Reskilling Syrian Agricultural Workforce

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational agricultural knowledge and possession of fieldwork experience
context.additional_context: Participatory educational design considering tech constraints (smartphone-centric access) in conflict zones, utilizing both physical materials and low-spec mobile-compatible content.

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain the three core technologies of soilless cultivation systems: hydroponics, aquaponics, and substrate cultivation
By the end of the course, learners can produce one or more soilless cultivation design blueprints applicable to field settings
Over 80% of learners can participate three or more times in real-time collaborative tasks using mobile devices

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
